# Ignore build results
bin/
obj/
*.exe
*.dll
*.pdb

# User-specific files
*.user
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Logs and databases
*.log
*.ldb

# Visual Studio working files
.vscode/
.vs/
.vscode/

# IDE-specific settings
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Ignore generated files
*.generated.cs
Generated_Code/

# Rider specific
.idea/

# Dependencies
*.nuget/
packages/
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# Configuration files
appsettings.json
appsettings.*.json
